mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfAffOrdErr Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ AFF_ORD_SN , AFF_COM_NM , AFF_COM_ID , AFF_VRSC_COM_ID , AFF_GOD_ORD_NO , AFF_ITM_ORD_NO , ERP_GOD_NO , ITM_NM , AFF_ORD_ERR_CONT , CNTC_SECT_CD , ERR_SECT_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT FROM INF_AFF_ORD_ERR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfAffOrdErr Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM INF_AFF_ORD_ERR WHERE 1 = 1
